name: Python Crash Course 3rd Edition
short_description: A hands-on, project-based introduction to programming. Excellent for beginners and those looking to solidify Python fundamentals.

name: Django for Professionals
short_description: Build, test, and deploy production-ready Django web applications. Covers Docker, PostgreSQL, and more advanced topics.

name: Scikit-learn User Guide
short_description: The official documentation for Scikit-learn, an essential resource for practical machine learning in Python.

name: Render PaaS
short_description: A cloud platform that makes it easy to build, deploy, and scale applications. Great for Django projects.

name: Deep Learning Specialization by DeepLearning.AI
short_description: Coursera specialization by Andrew Ng, covering foundations of Deep Learning, Neural Networks, CNNs, RNNs, and more.
